Parameters: Intent: The intent to modify for always showing browser UI.
setAlwaysUseBrowserUI(android.content.In.Description: Adds the necessary flags and extras to signal any browser supporting custom tabs to use the browser UI at all times and avoid showing custom tab like UI. Calling this with an intent will override any custom tabs related customizations.

Returns: Whether the browser UI should be used exclusively.
Parameters: Intent: The intent to check for the required flags and extras.
